title: El Tigre Braum's Q nearly invisible
body: Was playing a game against El Tigre Braum and his Q is nearly invisible.  I don't know if this is intended, but if it is, it should be reworked.

replies.body:
Hi there! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating an issue where the entire particle isn't displaying, and instead the chair is missing, and you're only seeing the yellow glow that would be around the chair. 

If you wouldn't mind, could you attach your **r3dlogs** from the game you were experiencing this in? 

Each file appears like this: [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

You can find them here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs

Thanks!
Oh God lol, I'll take a look and see if I can't find it.  Thank ya.  Edit, found it!

> [{quoted}](name=Fanryu,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zwIWiGck,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-27T18:34:50.829+0000)
>
> Oh God lol, I'll take a look and see if I can't find it.  Thank ya.  Edit, found it!

Thanks! I should have mentioned this earlier, too, but could you also attach a DXDiag?

> [{quoted}](name=Fanryu,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zwIWiGck,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-27T22:38:24.808+0000)
>
> Sure.  Here ya go.

Thanks so much!

No problem, but while we have you here, do you have any update on the Logitech mouse files not working with League?  If they're active, they crash my game at the start and I can't connect until after everyone else loads in.

> [{quoted}](name=Fanryu,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zwIWiGck,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T00:19:58.696+0000)
>
> No problem, but while we have you here, do you have any update on the Logitech mouse files not working with League?  If they're active, they crash my game at the start and I can't connect until after everyone else loads in.

Unfortunately, I don't know much about that kind of stuff, I'm limited to a crap ton of skins knowledge. D: 

However, I did find [this post](http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1gn3vt/fix_crash_after_champion_select/) on Reddit a while back, where someone found a workaround similar to the issue you're describing. Maybe try this? (Sorry I can't be more help D:)
Well, if you could pass it along, that'd be great.  Everytime there is an update, it resets and I forget to fix it again.  Thanks for all the help though!

> [{quoted}](name=Fanryu,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zwIWiGck,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T00:54:44.409+0000)
>
> Well, if you could pass it along, that'd be great.  Everytime there is an update, it resets and I forget to fix it again.  Thanks for all the help though!

Can do! And no problem!
Seems like riot has the answer already. WE'll see a fix soon enough!
